_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

What is wearing away [sn35.82:2.9]: The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact.
